title: AI Chat Bot with Flask
description: A conversational AI application built with Flask that integrates OpenAI's GPT models to provide intelligent responses. Features user authentication, conversation history, and real-time chat functionality.

title: Stock Price Prediction Model
description: A machine learning model using LSTM neural networks to predict stock prices based on historical data. Includes data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation with various metrics.

title: E-commerce REST API
description: A comprehensive REST API for e-commerce applications with features like user authentication, product management, order processing, and payment integration using Stripe.

title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
description: A data science project analyzing customer behavior patterns using K-means clustering and RFM analysis. Provides actionable insights for marketing strategies and customer retention.

title: Task Management Web App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration features, and progress tracking dashboards.

title: Weather Forecast Mobile App
tools: React Native, OpenWeather API, Redux, AsyncStorage
description: A cross-platform mobile app providing detailed weather forecasts, location-based updates, and weather alerts. Features offline storage and beautiful UI animations.

title: Image Classification CNN
description: A convolutional neural network for image classification with a web interface for real-time predictions. Trained on custom dataset with data augmentation techniques.

title: Blog CMS with Django
description: A full-featured content management system for blogging with rich text editing, user roles, comment system, and SEO optimization features.

title: Sales Dashboard Analytics
description: An interactive sales dashboard providing real-time analytics, KPI tracking, and customizable visualizations for business intelligence and decision making.

title: Social Media API Gateway
description: A high-performance API gateway for social media applications with rate limiting, caching, authentication, and integration with multiple social platforms.

title: Expense Tracker Mobile App
description: A cross-platform expense tracking app with budget management, category-wise spending analysis, and cloud synchronization using Firebase backend.

title: Sentiment Analysis Pipeline
tools: Python, NLTK, spaCy, Apache Kafka, Docker
description: A scalable sentiment analysis pipeline processing real-time social media data with natural language processing techniques and automated reporting features.
